entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Pembroke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:29 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 10:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: SSW 20 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
